name: songstat.us
description: Broadcast what you're listening to on Spotify as a Slack status

scripts.electron:copy-static: mkdir -p build/electron/static ; cp -R electron/static build/electron/ ; cp cert.pem build/ ; cp key.pem build/
scripts.electron:dev-dist-react: yarn electron:copy-static && concurrently  "tsc -p electron -w" "tsc -p electron && electron ."
scripts.electron:dev: yarn electron:copy-static && concurrently "BROWSER=none yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron -w" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron && electron ."
scripts.electron:windev: yarn electron:copy-static && concurrently "SET BROWSER=none && yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron -w" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: yarn build && tsc -p electron && yarn electron:copy-static
